Welcome!!

Hit start to get the game started! You play as Pacman, and your objective is to eat all the dots. Standing in your way are the four ghosts. Being caught by one of these ghosts will lead to your demise so try to avoid it!

To help against the ghosts, there are four powerpills scattered around the map. Once you eat one, Pacman wil be able to eat the ghosts. However once the effect runs out, you better make sure to avoid them again!

Use the up, down, right, left arrow keys on your keyboard to control Pacman

Good luck!
